I spend most of my days untangling knots of code. A lot of days, it gets me frustrated, incredulous. How do they not see the knots? ðŸ˜¤

Today, however, it made me melancholy. How do they not see the knots? ðŸ˜¢ They keep tying them, over and over. How do they not see the knots?! ðŸ¥º
